app_structure

Class CountersSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • app_structure.CountersSystem

  • public class CountersSystem
extends java.lang.Object
    The CounterSystem class is used by the FileReader class and represents the control of defect assessment counters. It currently has 4 counters: - DCI for correctly identified defects; - DII for incorrectly identified defects; - ADCI for absence of correctly identified defects; - ADII for absence of incorrectly identified defects;
    Author:
    ES1-2019-IC1-24

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CountersSystem()
      Create a CountersSystem instance with all counters (DCI, DII, ADCII, ADII) at zero.

      • increment

        public void increment(boolean long_method,
                      boolean value)
        Through the various characteristics of each indicator, account for the existence of each indicator and count the number of times that they occur.
        Parameters:
        long_method - - boolean value taken the excel archive of the is_long_method column (8th) or the is_feature_envy column (11st).
        value - - boolean value taken the excel archive of the ClientRule, PMD, IPlasma.
